goal: Add XP tracking per skill and ensure every 'use' action maps to a skill gain.
decisions: Keep existing skill level fields for compatibility but back them with per-skill XP progress data.
Use simple level-up thresholds (10 + 5 * level) and cap levels at 100.
Award skill XP on all universal use flows (foraging, chopping, processing, fire handling, blueprint crafting).
plan: Add SkillProgress storage and XP helpers while keeping serde compatibility.
Wire universal use interactions to call improve() for their matching skills.
Verify builds/tests and update todo.json with progress.
notes: Progress map seeds from existing level values so old saves stay valid.
Skill IDs remain string-based and reuse the existing skill names.
